mapper.sql: id, qt_id, qt_name, type_id, type_name, user_id, user_name, answer, status, score, time, memory, write_date
mapper.select:
select
from tb_response where user_id = #{0} and qt_id = #{1} order by id desc

select
from tb_response where status='已打开' and user_id = #{0} and qt_id = #{1} order by id desc

select
from tb_response where user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_response (id, qt_id, qt_name, type_id, type_name, user_id, user_name, answer, status, score, time, memory, write_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{writeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
